message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite high. Could you consider $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,200?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I can't go much lower. How about $8,600? This is my final offer.
